      boolean usesEncryption,
      int maxBytes,
      java.lang.String verifyCode)
        Parameters:
        address - the IP address
        port - the port for the client to send messages through
        maxBytes - the maximum amount of bytes the client should handle
        usesEncryption - whether or not the client should use encryption
        verifyCode - the code used to verify the client game
